welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Xiaotangzhuang, a charming city rich in history and known for its beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay with us!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main and oldest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, mainly serving domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
